1284860.name: ER Pandemic Simulator
1284860.description:
10% of the profits from the sale of the game will be given to the fight against the Coronavirus (COVID-19) Pandemic.


In the game you have a basic health encyclopedia where you can learn about the symptoms of various diseases. And based on a brief examination, medical history and patient responses, you will be diagnosing the disease. Also, remember that people often do not tell the whole truth or sometimes even lie in such situations.


When the medical history alone is not sufficient for diagnosis, perform additional examinations. You will have a laboratory, ultrasound, ECG, X-ray, CT, MRI and more.



You must be very careful to capture all the patients infected with a new virus and isolate them as soon as possible. And when a virus attacks with all its power, the practice acquired in a more peaceful time will prove invaluable.



During a pandemic, supplies of medicines, personal protective equipment and available beds will run out very quickly. Control their quantity, order additional supplies of equipment and medicines. You can call the army for help – they’ll put tents near the hospital and help you save patients. But remember, it's the military: “Private, don't lie around waiting for an ambulance, just do push-ups.”

Your shift is no longer 8 hours - you are now working all the time. Remember to find a moment to sleep and eat. And most importantly, you must be careful not to get infected yourself.
After all, so much depends on you!

FEATURES:

  • a health encyclopedia with symptoms of over 70 diseases and treatments
  • a laboratory that can identify more than 30 strains of bacteria and viruses
  • 12 different self-service diagnostic devices
  • a 3-floor hospital with over 100 rooms
  • ordering medications and equipment
  • an “investigation” system - medical history
